snippet: Watson, who said this would be his final British Open, said fans wearing Watson masks “scared me,” and J.B. Holmes described his seven on the 15th hole.
abstract: Tom Watson, appearing at what he says will be his final British Open, expresses frustration with his play and fright at fans who are wearing masks that resemble his face; other British Open news noted.

byline.original: By SAM BORDEN and KAREN CROUSE

lead_paragraph: Watson, who said this would be his final British Open, said fans wearing Watson masks “scared me,” and J.B. Holmes described his seven on the 15th hole.

headline.main: British Open 2015: Tom Watson Isn’t Happy About How He Looks on Course, or on Fans’ Masks
headline.print_headline: Watson Isn’t Happy About How He Looks on Course, or on Fans’ Masks
